text: int main ( ) { unsigned int i , n , t ; long int * a , sum = 0 ; scanf ( "%u" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%u" , & n ) ; a = ( long int * ) malloc ( n * sizeof ( long int ) ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%ld" , a + i ) ; } for ( i = 0 ; i < n - 1 ; i ++ ) { if ( * ( a + i ) > * ( a + i + 1 ) ) { sum = sum + * ( a + i + 1 ) ; } else { sum = sum + * ( a + i ) ; * ( a + i + 1 ) = * ( a + i ) ; } } printf ( "%ld\n" , sum ) ; sum = 0 ; } return 0 ; }
